Description: Lower body and conical foot sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style patterned pottery chalice; white slip; glaze fired red-brown; interior glazed streakily with reserved dot in centre of bowl; exterior: bowl reserved; glazed on foot; inscription on interior.
Curator's comments: Unusuall text, cut in interior of chalice.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 441)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Johnston 2006a / Trademarks on Greek Vases: Addenda (p. 170, no. 43)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0957) (phase 2)
